content:
Carol Macumber said:

HTA has registered the Place of Service code system owned by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). The information on this page has been reviewed by HTA, the Financial WG and CMS. The process to it accurately represented at terminology.hl7.org is in progress. To comment, please do so on the corresponding JIRA ticket.

https://confluence.hl7.org/display/TA/Centers+for+Medicaid+and+Medicare+Services+%28CMS%29+Place+of+Service+Codes

Thanks,
Carol/HTA
Ted Klein Jessica Snell Robert McClure Rob Hausam
